CONSTRUCTION COORDINATOR

SUMMARY

Dedicated and results-driven OSP Specialist with twenty years of progressive and diversified experience in Outside Plant Telecommunications Engineering and Construction, Wireless Backhaul Engineering, Low Latency Optimization and related areas.
Proven skills include the ability to manage multiple projects and meet critical deadlines, knowledge of construction methodologies associated with the placement of aerial and underground systems, design, engineering, estimation & budgeting, project management, analysis, problem solving, and various CAD programs.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Maintenenance and Engineering Manager

Location: Appleton, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description

Job Title: Maintenenance and Engineering Manager

City: Appleton / State: Wisconsin

Job Description

Join Reynolds Consumer Products…and Drive Your Career across a world of opportunities! We provide amazing job opportunities for growth with competitive salaries and benefits in an exciting, dynamic, fast-paced, and fun workplace environment. If you are looking to build a strong career, we have an opportunity for you! We currently have an opportunity for a Maintenenance and Engineering Manager to join our team at our Presto Products plant in Appleton, Wisconsin.

Your Role:

As a Maintenenance and Engineering Manager, you will be responsible for leading and supervising the plant maintenance and engineering departments responsible for repairing, maintaining, and installing machines, tools, equipment. This includes driving continuous improvement and solving chronic process and equipment issues to ensure that each process is optimized to meet current goals.

You will have the opportunity to:

Supervise all aspects of maintaining production equipment and facilities at the plant to ensure safe and efficient operations.Develop and maintain preventative maintenance programs.Set priorities for projects and work orders pertaining to the maintenance function.Train and develop our employees.

Ultimately, you will express your ideas and make recommendations for improvements. Ultimately, you will make our processes more efficient and productive therefore you will have a direct impact on the company!

You will love it here if…

You are a strong leaderYou are a creative problem solverYou are a forward-thinker with ideas that you want to be heardYou are detail-oriented but can also see the big picture

We need you to have:

BS in Engineering (Electrical, Chemical, Mechanical preferred).5+ years of professional and progressive experience in plant operations.2+ years prior technical team management experience.Experience using statistical tools for problem solving.Experience with continuous improvement processes and initiatives such as 5S, Six Sigma, Value Streams, and TPM.

Icing on the cake:

MBA or other advanced degree.Experience in polyethylene bag-making environment.

Want to know more? Check out our website or connect with us on LinkedIn!

Apply today to join a fast-growing innovative company!

Not a good fit but know someone who is? Please refer them!

Local candidates only, no relocation assistance available

Join Reynolds Consumer Products and 

Drive Your Career across a world of opportunities! 

For applicants or employees who are disabled or require a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or hiring process, you may request assistance by emailing us at Recruitment@ReynoldsBrands.com.

No recruiter calls or emails please.

Reynolds Consumer Products is an Equal Opportunity Employer EEO AA M/F/Vet/Disability.

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, genetics, or disability.

Reynolds Consumer Products is an Equal Opportunity Employer that complies with the laws and regulations set forth in the following EEO is The Law Poster: http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf

The Pay Transparency Regulations Frequently Asked Questions can be found on this link:

Pay Transparency Regulations Frequently Asked Questions | U.S. Department of Labor (dol.gov)

The poster and the supplement can be found on this link.

http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/ofccpost.htm

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
